description: This scholarship was established by the Edmond Amateur Radio Society in honor of Bertha Wilson. Funds are used to support a College of Business student who meets the criteria stated below. Eligibility Requirements Must be a College of Business major Must have completed 30+ credit hours at the time of application Enrolled full-time Minimum 2.75 GPA Preferred female who works either part-time or full-time This scholarship is available to apply for during the current student application period.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
